situation.title: Corporate events
situation.meta_description: Rules and recommendations for corporate events.

content.processed:
Currently, all corporate events such as congresses, conferences, educational meetings or teambuildings are prohibited.

The workplace is one of the most common places of infection, as there is a large concentration of people from different backgrounds for a long period of time. That is also why the government called upon all employers for whom the nature of their work and operating conditions allows them to agree with their employees to work from home.
